results.content:
Very good comprehensive course on how to get started with Facebook Messenger. I found this much more comprehensive and understandable than other courses on the subject on Udemy.
However, it would be nice if more lectures would be added on building more complex bots that perform operations with the payload and that might even involve databases where information is stored.
results.content_html:

results.content: Overall, a great course. A couple of the steps regarding setting up the Facebook and Twitter facade are a bit out of date.
results.content_html: Overall, a great course. A couple of the steps regarding setting up the Facebook and Twitter facade are a bit out of date.

results.content:
I took this course, because I was interested in developing my own chatbot. Honestly the course is exactly what I was looking for!
The course starts with very basic knowledge (for me even too basic) and shows how to develop your own chatbot step by step. The course's objective is to have your own fully working chatbot. Most I liked all the examples in the course. Jan is constantly trying to show how everything looks like in practise (and in real code!). Furthermore Jan is very motivated and was more than happy to answer my questions ;)
In sum, I really enjoyed this course and it was a great help!

response.content: Hey Felix, thanks for the in-depth review, really appreciate it!
response.content_html: Hey Felix, thanks for the in-depth review, really appreciate it!

response.content: Thank you! Glad to read that :)

results.content: I didnt know anything about chatbots before. Thats why I took this course and I can say that the course gave me a really good introduction to chatbots. I learned how to build a simple chatbot with laravel and I even got it published. Verifying the webhook with the Facebook API was a little tricky for me but no problem in the end. Great stuff!

response.content: Hi Arne, thank you so much for your feedback! Happy that the verification part turned out to be no problem in the end :)

results.content:
very hands-on and to the point, yet still providing a comprehensive overview about modern chatbots. the teacher Jan is also doing a great job. 
highly recommended if you want to learn how to build a chatbot yourself both quickly and successfully!
